comments.body: here wanted to keep `nodeSelectorKV` optional, so if `nil` value is passed, not setting `pod.Spec.NodeSelector`
yes, good point.  I didn't read carefully enough.

It seems that calling `RunKubectlOrDie` passing in `ls filepath` is more intuitive than looking for an empty string returned from `cat`.
Also, the func name is specific to vshere but the code is fairly generic. I don't see existing code to do what you want, so maybe the name can be more generic, and maybe this func can be moved to _framework/util.goi_?
What do you think about using a more generic func name and moving func to a common file? I don't see anything vsphere specific here and it might be useful for other tests.
